name: tokenz
description: Insert any type of short codes into your document. You can add smileys (:), ;), ...) or emojis (:smile:, :wink:, ...). More code maps will be added later. Even you, as a user can create your own.

scripts.package: zip obsidian-tokenz manifest.json main.js README.md styles.css versions.json data/*.json data/*.lst
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.syntax_silent:win32: @echo Syntax check... && tsc -noEmit && @echo Syntax check: Okay, no errors!
scripts.syntax_silent:linux: echo Syntax check... && tsc -noEmit &&  echo Syntax check: Okay, no errors!

author: Ferenc Moricz
